mapper.insert: insert into imfind.FreeReply (rno, bno, reply_f, replyer_f, reply_f_date) values (#{rno}, #{bno}, #{reply_f}, #{replyer_f}, now())
mapper.update: update imfind.FreeReply set reply_f = #{reply_f} where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select rno, bno, reply_f, replyer_f, reply_f_date from imfind.FreeReply where bno = #{bno} order by rno
